import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function CreateBook(props) { const [book, setBook] = useState({}); function handleChange(e) { const name = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; setBook({ ...book, [name]: value }); console.log(book); } function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); props.addBook(book); setBook({ id: "", name: "", price: "" }); } return ( <>

); } { /*
